text: Thanks a lot! <@UD53A9UUR>

In prod emailbodyPlaintext=“”

                “plainTextVersion”: ” actual value”.  in test
while empty in prod
Can you PM me your requests (without hapikey) please
<https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/emails?hapikey=####> &name=tenure_thank_you_new
response is :
This is from test environment
and this is from prod environment
do you know as i can get this propierty?
Hello everyone, I need help with something. :slightly_smiling_face:
On this blog I want the banner image to be responsive for desktop as well as mobile phone.
<https://blog.eatforlifebymarsha.com/articles/tag/food-focus>
Can anyone please help me what code should I add in the blog template?

Hey,

you can set your CSS for image responsive

Where to find your CSS Style Sheet: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/es/design-manager/edit-the-stylesheets-applied-to-a-specific-page>

Style: img{max-width: 100%; height: auto;}

I hope this will help.

This could be helpful as well
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/files/automatic-image-resizing-on-HubSpot-content>
Awesome, let me try to implement these solutions. Thank you very much for the quick response.
